title: El Salvador president's $5 billion worth of free passports scheme has got Americans abuzz over ‘genius’ strategy
description: If you fit the severely specific criteria, you may be eligible for a free El Salvador passport. On Sunday, the President of the Central American country, Nayib Bukele, announced via an X post that they were extending the prestigious offer of 5000 free passports to “highly skilled scientists, enginee...

title: El Salvador Sells $1 Billion Bond Linked to IMF, Rating
description:
(Bloomberg) -- El Salvador returned to global debt markets with an offering that will pay investors a higher interest rate if the government fails to win credit upgrades or a deal with the International Monetary Fund.

The Central American nation priced $1 billion in debt due in 2030 at 89.923 cents...
